personal-dashboard.intro_text: What do you want to do?
personal-dashboard.create_empty_workspace: Create whatever you want on an empty canvas
personal-dashboard.we_love_ideas: We love ideas and look at it right away
personal-dashboard.find_the_small_circle: Find the small circle that is flashing and continue where you left off
personal-dashboard.can_not_create_more_workspaces: You can not create more workspaces. Upgrade to make more.
personal-dashboard.localsteps_frontpage: Here you are now! The front page contains an overview of your latest work areas and changes.
personal-dashboard.localsteps_workspace: Here you will find an overview of work areas. They are the core of the platform and that's where you can obtain group charts and make analyzes!
personal-dashboard.localsteps_data_builder: Here you will find an overview of the individual building blocks, which you can see and edit. Building blocks is a collective term for the content of the work area.
personal-dashboard.localsteps_output: Under Report Content, you can upload files or write paradigm texts, which should be the result of the legal analysis. In this way, Juristic can prepare the first draft of, for example, a memorandum or a structural report - and even in a few minutes.
personal-dashboard.localsteps_red_flags: Red flags are advanced notifications that appear while drawing in individual work areas - in real time.

HorizontalNewsCard.title: Welcome to Juristic (beta)
HorizontalNewsCard.desc: Thanks for joining! We have worked hard to develop the platform so that it is both easy and intuitive to use. If you need a little introduction, we have put together a little guide.

create_new_feature.dialog_content_text: Here you can create a new feature. You must first choose whether it should be possible to enter a specific value ('Value') or whether the user should be able to choose between some specific items ('Options').

not_allowed.delete: To delete groups are restricted to users on a pro subscription.
not_allowed.add: To add groups are restricted to users on a pro subscription.

node-actions.can_not_delete_it: It appears that you are using this item in workspaces or in conditions. You cannot delete it until you have removed it from these.

workspaces.can_not_create_more_workspaces: You can not create more workspaces. Upgrade to make more.
workspaces.describing the work area: Start by describing the work area. Select the group 'Corporate'
workspaces.insert_text_boxes_and_notes: You can insert text boxes and notes via this quick button.
workspaces.insert_elements: Insert elements, such as companies and individuals, via this quick button.
workspaces.other_functions: In this menu you will find the other functions. Here you can save the changes in your work area!
workspaces.change_name_description_and_group: If you want to change the name, description and group - or change the sharing setting - click here.
workspaces.press_analyze_btn_to_create_a_note_or_re: Press the Analyze button to create a note or report based on the drawing in the work area.
workspaces.get_a_full_overview_of_red_flags: You can also get a full overview of red flags in the work area - even if you have already seen them.
workspaces.share_workspace_with_non_juristic_user: If you need to share the workspace with someone who is not a Juristic user, you can do so here.
workspaces.connected_juristic_to_cvr_in_dk_swe_no_f: We have connected Juristic to the company registers in Denmark, Sweden, Norway and Finland. Try clicking here now!
workspaces.drawing_error: We had an error drawing the group chart. Our developers are informed and are on the case!
workspaces.you_can_not_create_new_relationship_type: Du kan ikke lave nye relationstyper. Dette er en Draw-feature. Kontakt os for mere information.
workspaces.you_can_not_create_new_item_types: You can not create new item types. This is a Draw feature. Contact us for more information.
workspaces.you_can_not_create_new_attribute_types: You can not create new attribute types. This is a Draw feature. Contact us for more information.
workspaces.search_for_a_company_or_CVR_number: Search for a company or registration number
workspaces.your_work_areas_will_be_locked: Your work areas will be locked after 90 days on base

workspace-form.name: Name
workspace-form.checkbox: Share your work area with the rest of your organization

workspaces.public_editable_notification: You do not have access. Ask permission from the person, who invited you to this workspace.

help-support.faq_text: We have gathered the most frequently asked questions in a clear overview below. If you have others, you are of course always welcome to send us a message via the contact form on the right.

red_flag_expl.expl1: A red flag is a special feature that can help you analyze and identify certain legal issues.
red_flag_expl.expl2: Red flags automatically appear in your workspace as you draw - and users with a Pro subscription can even design and create their own red flags.

is_it_really_free_expl.expl1: Depending on the subscription you have selected, you will have access to different features or editions of Juristic.
is_it_really_free_expl.expl2: Of course, you can always continue as a free user.

help-support.how_can_i_get_further_help?: How can I get further help?

how_can_i_get_further_help_expl.expl1: You are always welcome to contact us for help with functions or your user. You do this on the right or via the contact information on our website.
how_can_i_get_further_help_expl.expl2: We will respond as soon as possible. Pro and Enterprise users have access to special support features depending on the agreement.

how_to_program_law_expl.expl1: With Juristic Draw and Juristic Pro, you get access to a specially developed function, which makes it possible to 'program' legal content, such as red flags or paradigms.
how_to_program_law_expl.expl2: The special thing is that you do not need other programs or to be able to code. Drag and drop items - just like you are used to.

is_it_safe_to_use_expl.expl1: All versions of Juristic are developed according to usual best practice. Thus, your work areas, elements, etc. always encrypted on servers in Europe. The Pro and Enterprise versions include additional security features that are targeted at businesses.
is_it_safe_to_use_expl.expl2: You can read more about how we process data in our business terms and personal data policy. You can find both on our website.

help-support.why_are_not_all_features_available yet?: Why are not all features available yet?

why_are_not_all_features_available yet_e.expl1: Juristic is still in 'beta'. This means that the platform is still under development - and there are therefore many more features on the way.
why_are_not_all_features_available yet_e.expl2: However, it also means that you will experience certain errors that we are still working hard to resolve.

guide-slider.welcome_text: Juristic is a visual platform for advisors.
guide-slider.cvr_import_text: With our Corporate Register tool, you can get an overview in seconds.
guide-slider.red_flags_text: With red flags, you get input while drafting.
guide-slider.get_a_better_overview_text: With our visual tool you get a better overview of issues.
guide-slider.get_your_own_content: Get your own content or 1-click reports
guide-slider.get_your_own_content_text: Upgrade today to get more features with Base, Draw and Pro.

timeline-widget.jump_into_a_work_area: You have not used Juristic yet. Jump into a work area and get started.

mobile-disclaimer.you_re_on_a_mobile_device: It looks like you're on a mobile device 📱
mobile-disclaimer.desc: Many of our features work on mobile devices but for the best experience, we recommend that you use a browser on your computer.
mobile-disclaimer.contact_us: If you have any questions, please contact us.

upgrade-modal.you_have_now_upgraded_your_user: Congratulations, you have now upgraded your user!
upgrade-modal.desc: You've got access to your extra features! We're glad you're finding value in Juristic. If you experience problems, or if you just have questions, you are always welcome to call or write to us.

public_workspace.hint: You have recieved the code via SMS. If you have any issues, please contact the person who has shared this workspace with you.

analysis.nothing: There is nothing to analyse yet

alerts.nothing: There is no red flags yet
